title: Evidence for Results for Adverse event free and hypertension control at 12 weeks in QUARTET USA Trial Control Group

observed.display: Adverse event free and hypertension control at 12 weeks

note.text: The reported percentage (33.3%) does not match the value reported for this outcome in ClinicalTrials.gov results reporting (34.6% at https://fevir.net/resources/Composition/370504)
